post.body: I'm so getting a boxee shirt to add to my geek shirt collection!
yeah, it works fine for me -- but I'm on an iPod touch (2g) so it might be different for iPhones
we just saw you on channel 2!!!
awesome! @grobertson and I are moving on Jan 2 so we're buying our tv after the holiday. Cannot wait
congrats!!
1080i is still awesome. And just think, the next TV can use it
demon avr1905 a 7.1 onkyo system and formerly a 42" toahiba rear projection - getting a 1080p LCD for Xmas.
that's a nice player from what I've read. I almost got that one. I'm in the US so Nwtflix support sold me
oh, not at all. Some years more, some less - but the average is at least that
exactly. And I worked at Best Buy for like 5 years
technically Christmas 1998 but I didn't start buying in earnest until september 1999
reports I've read say yes - on the iPod touch it has never been a problem
I'm glad I waited. Earlier incarnations weren't ready and were so expensive, taking that fact into account
just ordered the samsung 2500. Blu-ray spec 2 and he netflix streaming
ensured = insured. It's early
Oh, I totally have it ensured. Pictures, a Delicious Library 2 database, the works.
Tweetsville caches an assload of tweets too -- both are great clients. Props to both devs
I agree (and I love your icon!). Snappier -- stability wise, on the iPod touch they are the same. But Tweetie is snappier
yup! Just moving to a bigger unit in my same complex. Still stressful, but not awful
ordered me pizza. Packing commences.
if you paid more than $1 for the Trump book, you are officially a sucker :-)
just DM me your e-mail
Psshaw, you have too much to do! I'm moving! Then going to SF!
Yes, yes it will. But they might take a long time to arrive. I say go, let them know what you want when you walk in
I do! Just DM me your e-mail
sure just dm me your e-mail
I am now! DM me your e-mail
try me now!
Of course!
@rickievans @drock999 - e-mail address? DM me and I'll get it to you.
thank you!! You too! Moving so often must be stressful. Fortunately I'm only having to go a few hundred yards.
thanks Rick! Back atcha!
Yay, Atlanta Tweetup tonight!!
Had I dropped $500 or $600 on blu-ray last year or in '06, I'd be pissed now
OK, books = packed. Most clothes packed. First temper tantrum (mine), over. Back to finishing packing closet.
RT: @jcornelius: Atlanta Web Unwrapped Party TONIGHT! 8pm @ Vinyl in the CW Complex. Ping @tessa for details
OK -- I'll still be happy to provide anyone with a @boxee invite, but I'm going to be packing so the turnaround won't be lightening fast
Anyone who needs a @boxee invite -- DM me your e-mail address or send it to blog at christinawarren dot com
I really didn't want to hack WEP or WPA to get net access. W00t for people without passwords.
SCORE. Open WiFi neart the new unit since cable doesn't come until Tuesday, this will be very helpful for Monday...
